# [\#87 Issue](https://github.com/typst/biblatex/issues/87) `open`: the dependency paste is unmaintained, should switch to another alternative

#### <img src="https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/97109381?v=4" width="50">[that-ambuj](https://github.com/that-ambuj) opened issue at [2025-07-05 06:42](https://github.com/typst/biblatex/issues/87):

I noticed in my rust_sec ci that the dependency paste in no longer maintained. It should probably be replaced with proc_macro2's `ident!` macro or some other crate.
